sense.gloss: having great difficulty with, struggling greatly with, being in distress
extremely, in the extreme, knows no bounds (e.g. rudeness), unparalleled
to carry to extremes, to go to the end of something, to reach the limits of something
to reach the peak of something (e.g. luxury, hardships, etc), to be extremely (e.g. busy)
to investigate thoroughly, to research thoroughly, to master, to understand completely
to exhaust completely, to have nothing left (e.g. to say)
investigation (e.g. academically, of the unknown), close inquiry (enquiry)
to reach an extreme, to reach a limit, to terminate, to come to an end
to be stuck, to be in a dilemma, to be at a loss
to be decided, to be settled
there is nothing more that can be done, it's all over
necessity is the mother of invention, there is always some way out of a difficulty if you really look for one
the poor, the needy, the destitute
desperate measure, expedient of last resort
as eternal as heaven and earth
to be driven into a corner, to be left with nowhere to turn, to be in a dilemma
to be unable to go forward or backward, to be stranded, to get stuck
a cornered rat will bite the cat, one who is cornered will fight like a devil
to be at a loss, to be puzzled, to be perplexed, to be at one's wit's end, to be in a dilemma, to not know what to (do, say, etc)
to be pressed for, to be pinched for, to become poor, to be reduced to poverty
a cornered rat will bite a cat, despair gives courage to a coward

sdata.j: ↑窮地↑↓きゅうち↓から↑足掻↑↓あが↓き↑出↑↓で↓る。
sdata.e: He will wriggle out of the fix.

sdata.j: ↑窮鼠↑↓きゅうそ↓↑猫↑↓ねこ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓む。
sdata.e: A cornered rat will bite a cat.

sdata.j: ↑窮↑↓きゅう↓すれば↑通↑↓つう↓ず。
sdata.e: Necessity is the mother of invention.

sdata.j: ↑飢饉↑↓ききん↓が↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓にひどい↑窮乏↑↓きゅうぼう↓をもたらした。
sdata.e: Famine caused great distress among the people.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓らの↑店↑↓みせ↓は↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓っていたが、↑今↑↓いま↓や↑窮地↑↓きゅうち↓を↑脱↑↓だっ↓して、↑商売↑↓しょうばい↓を↑拡張↑↓かくちょう↓するまでになっている。
sdata.e: We thought their shop was a failure, but now they've gotten out from under and even expanded.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑財政↑↓ざいせい↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑困窮↑↓こんきゅう↓していた。↑要↑↓よう↓するに↑破産↑↓はさん↓したのだ。
sdata.e: We were financially troubled, in short, we were bankrupt.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑返答↑↓へんとう↓に↑窮↑↓きゅう↓した。
sdata.e: I was at a loss for an answer.

sdata.j: ボーイフレンドが↑職場↑↓しょくば↓に↑電話↑↓でんわ↓をかけてきたために、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑窮地↑↓きゅうち↓に↑陥↑↓おちい↓った。
sdata.e: She got into hot water when her boyfriend called her at work.

sdata.j: その↑大臣↑↓だいじん↓は↑不正↑↓ふせい↓↑取引↑↓とりひき↓によって↑窮地↑↓きゅうち↓に↑立↑↓た↓ちました。
sdata.e: The minister was in a fix over illegal dealings.

sdata.j: その↑家族↑↓かぞく↓はきわめて↑困窮↑↓こんきゅう↓していた。
sdata.e: The family lived in the depths of misery.

sdata.j: いけすかないボスだけど、↑仕事↑↓しごと↓の↑悩↑↓なや↓みを↑相談↑↓そうだん↓したら↑案外↑↓あんがい↓、↑窮鳥↑↓きゅうちょう↓↑懐↑↓ふところ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓れば↑猟師↑↓りょうし↓も↑殺↑↓ころ↓さず、てなことになるかもね。
sdata.e: The boss is hard to get along with. But if I try to talk to him about problems I have at work he might have a little heart. Even a hunter can't kill a bird who flies to him for protection.

sdata.j: あいつ↑追↑↓お↓いつめられたら↑何↑↓なに↓するか↑分↑↓わ↓からないぞ。↑窮鼠↑↓きゅうそ↓↑猫↑↓ねこ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓むってこともあるからな。↑気↑↓き↓を↑付↑↓つ↓けるに↑越↑↓こ↓したことはない。
sdata.e: I wouldn't push him too far. You don't know what he might do. I'd say you can't be too careful. They say even a doomed mouse will bite a cat if he has no choice.

sdata.j: ↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓してくれと↑言↑↓い↓われたとき、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑言葉↑↓ことば↓に↑窮↑↓きゅう↓した。
sdata.e: Asked to marry him, I was at a loss for words.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑困窮↑↓こんきゅう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓に↑毛布↑↓もうふ↓を↑供給↑↓きょうきゅう↓した。
sdata.e: The city supplied the needy with blankets.

sdata.j: ↑市↑↓し↓は↑困窮↑↓こんきゅう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓に↑毛布↑↓もうふ↓を↑支給↑↓しきゅう↓した。
sdata.e: The city supplied the needy with blankets.

sdata.j: ↑市↑↓し↓は↑困窮↑↓こんきゅう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓に↑毛布↑↓もうふ↓を↑供給↑↓きょうきゅう↓した。
sdata.e: The city supplied the needy with blankets.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑言葉↑↓ことば↓に↑窮↑↓きゅう↓した。
sdata.e: I didn't know how to express myself.

sdata.j: ↑人間↑↓にんげん↓↑楽↑↓らく↓ばかりしてるとダメになる。たまには、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓で↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑首↑↓くび↓をしめるくらい↑窮地↑↓きゅうち↓に↑追↑↓お↓い↑込↑↓こ↓むのもありだと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: Comfort can spoil you. Once in a while, it can do you good to corner yourself.

sdata.j: ↑大統領↑↓だいとうりょう↓は↑国民↑↓こくみん↓に↑貧窮↑↓ひんきゅう↓や↑病気↑↓びょうき↓との↑戦↑↓たたか↓いで↑団結↑↓だんけつ↓するように↑呼↑↓よ↓びかけた。
sdata.e: The president called on the people to unite in fighting poverty and disease.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑金↑↓きん↓に↑窮↑↓きゅう↓していた。
sdata.e: He was hard up.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はそんな↑窮乏↑↓きゅうぼう↓の↑中↑↓なか↓でどうやって↑暮↑↓く↓らしていたのか。
sdata.e: How did he make his living in such poverty?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑言葉↑↓ことば↓に↑窮↑↓きゅう↓した。
sdata.e: He didn't know how to express himself.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑仕事↑↓しごと↓をくびになってから↑困窮↑↓こんきゅう↓している。
sdata.e: He has been in deep water since he got fired from his job.

sdata.j: ↑列車↑↓れっしゃ↓のコンパートメントはすぐ↑窮屈↑↓きゅうくつ↓になる。
sdata.e: Train compartments soon get cramped.

sdata.j: まさかそのような↑窮地↑↓きゅうち↓に↑立↑↓た↓たされているとは↑露↑↓つゆ↓↑知↑↓し↓らず。
sdata.e: Good grief! I had no idea you had been placed in such a tight spot.

sdata.j: 「そんなに↑舐↑↓な↓められた↑相手↑↓あいて↓じゃないけどなぁ・・・」「そうだよ、↑窮鼠↑↓きゅうそ↓↑猫↑↓ねこ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓むって↑言↑↓い↓うじゃないか」
sdata.e: I don't think she's an opponent you can ignore like that ... "That's right, they say a cornered rat bites back, don't they?"

sdata.j: ↑非↑↓ひ↓の↑打↑↓う↓ち↑所↑↓どころ↓がない↑計画↑↓けいかく↓は、↑窮屈↑↓きゅうくつ↓だなあ。
sdata.e: A faultless plan is stifling, isn't it?

sdata.j: トムは↑言葉↑↓ことば↓に↑窮↑↓きゅう↓した。
sdata.e: Tom was at loss for words.

sdata.j: このパジャマはもうトムには↑窮屈↑↓きゅうくつ↓そうね。↑新↑↓あたら↓しいの↑買↑↓か↓おうね。
sdata.e: These pajamas look like they'd be too tight on Tom now. Let's buy some new ones.
